{{Wireless embedded system |brand=EnGenius |model=EPG5000 |revision= |asin=B00NWRENRE |fcc_date=09/15/2014 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=A8JEPG5000,U2M-PCE4553AH |pcb_id=ESR1750H-0.20 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9558;QCA9558-AT4A; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=32 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU64M16HG-AC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9558;QCA9558-AT4A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module=Senao PCE4553AH |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9880-BR4A;QCA9880-BR4A, NGB0649.002C, 1328, KOREA; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337N;QCA8337N-AL3C, EP1476.7B, 1310, TAIWAN; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE5003L1;5003L1, 2466Y, 1246 MY;3; |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Dual Band IoT Intelligent Cloud Gateway}} :[http://www.engeniustech.com/products/gateways-routers/epg5000.html Product page]
"ESR1750H-0.20 LFP" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{See also|EnGenius EAP1750H|Senao}}
